name: Demon Core (chazzzz)
description:
Description

You are a mad scientist, and you've just stolen an experimental nuclear gun powered by an unstable plutonium core! Collect plutonium to charge up your gun and do more damage, but be careful! If your gun is overcharged, then you will take damage over time, but overcharging your gun will also cause a chain reaction whenever you kill an enemy, arcing the laser onto all nearby enemies for a devastating effect! Try to use this to your advantage, but be careful you don't succumb to radiation poisoning in the process!

Controls
  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • Left Click: Shoot
  • E: Charge Gun
  • Q: Vent Gun (Discharge)
Tips
  • The overcharge effect on the gun is honestly OP. Try to get your gun overcharged, then quickly vent it (Q) once you have started the chain reaction
